title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.224 - Occasion of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.224 - Occasion of service

State Regulations
(a) A specific
identifiable act of service involved in the medical care of the patient which
does not require the assessment of the patient's condition nor the exercising
of independent judgment as to the patient's care. An example of an occasion of
service is a technician administering an injection. (b) An examination, a consultation or a
treatment in any of the services or facilities of the hospital. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.224

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
